1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Generic content class.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Content
6  ( -- * Generic content
7    CContent (..),
8    toDec, toDecReplace,
9    cTrimBoth, cTrimBegin, cTrimEnd,
10    valueContent,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                 as O
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                   as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                     as T
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Complex       as D
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Edge          as D
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class.Simple        as D
20
21-- | Generic content class.
22class (Show c, B.Default c,
23       D.CEmpty c, D.CEnd c,
24       D.CBool c, D.CCode c, D.CText c, D.CClock c, D.CTime c,
25       D.CTerm c, D.CDec c, D.CType c, D.CInterp c,
26       D.CList c, D.CSet c, D.CTie c, D.CRel c) =>
27    CContent c where
28
29    -- | Order of content type.
30    typeOrder :: c -> Int
31    typeOrder c
32        -- empty
33        | D.isEmpty    c = 1
34
35        -- simple numeric
36        | D.isBool     c = 11
37        | D.isDec      c = 12
38        | D.isClock    c = 13
39        | D.isTime     c = 14
40
41        -- simple textual
42        | D.isCode     c = 15
43        | D.isTerm     c = 16
44        | D.isText     c = 17
45
46        -- complex
47        | D.isList     c = 21
48        | D.isSet      c = 22
49        | D.isTie      c = 23
50        | D.isRel      c = 24
51        | D.isInterp   c = 25
52        | D.isType     c = 27
53
54        -- end
55        | D.isEnd      c = 31
56        | otherwise      = error "unknown content"
57
58-- | Convert some content to decimal number.
59toDec :: (CContent c) => O.Map c
60toDec = toDecWith id
61
62-- | Convert content to decimal number,
63--   or replace inconvertible content to constant decimal.
64--
65--   >>> toDecReplace (the $ pInt 0) (the $ pText "12.0")
66--   ContentDec Decimal (1) 12
67--
68--   >>> toDecReplace (the $ pInt 0) (the $ pText "aa")
69--   ContentDec Decimal (0) 0
70--
71toDecReplace :: (CContent c) => c -> O.Map c
72toDecReplace rep = toDecWith $ const rep
73
74toDecWith :: (CContent c) => O.Map c -> O.Map c
75toDecWith f c
76    | D.isText c  = case T.decodeDecimal $ D.gText c of
77                      Right n  -> D.pDec n
78                      Left _   -> f c
79    | D.isBool c  = case D.gBool c of
80                      True   -> D.pInt 1
81                      False  -> D.pInt 0
82    | otherwise   = f c
83
84-- | Trim spaces of text content.
85--
86--   >>> cTrimBoth (the $ pText " foo ")
87--   ContentText "foo"
88--
89cTrimBoth :: (CContent c) => O.Map c
90cTrimBoth = cTextMap O.trimBoth
91
92-- | Trim beginning spaces of text content.
93cTrimBegin :: (CContent c) => O.Map c
94cTrimBegin = cTextMap O.trimBegin
95
96-- | Trim ending spaces of text content.
97cTrimEnd :: (CContent c) => O.Map c
98cTrimEnd = cTextMap O.trimEnd
99
100cTextMap :: (CContent c) => S.CharsMap -> O.Map c
101cTextMap f c
102    | D.isText c  = D.pText $ f $ D.gText c
103    | otherwise   = c
104
105-- | Convert 'O.Value' to content.
106valueContent :: (CContent c) => O.Value -> c
107valueContent (O.VEmpty)      = D.empty
108valueContent (O.VBool b)     = D.pBool b
109valueContent (O.VInt i)      = D.pInt i
110valueContent (O.VInteger i)  = D.pInteger i
111valueContent (O.VStr s)      = D.pText s
112valueContent (O.VTx s)       = D.pText s
113valueContent (O.VTz s)       = D.pText s
114valueContent (O.VList cs)    = D.pList (valueContent <$> cs)
115
